title: 关于村民交易是否提供经验的nbt
author: mineconan
txt_content:
1.9
wiki上说每项交易里加入rewardExp:0后，与村民交易不会获得经验，试了之后发现没用

replies.author: ⊙v⊙
replies.txt_content:
mineconan 发表于 2017-10-7 03:48
/summon Villager ~1 ~3 ~ {
NoAI:1b,
Silent:1b,
0b或者false

replies.author: mineconan
pineapple_
replies.txt_content:
mineconan 发表于 2017-10-7 21:48
/summon Villager ~1 ~3 ~ {
NoAI:1b,
Silent:1b,
有些byte值不加后缀b好像就不行……
